settings.title: TechReady - Internet and our World - Multi-page Website Refresher

content.instructions:
This project is designed to give you a refresher on how the multi-page website is built so you can fully customize it for your final project.

The multi-page website is made of 3 main sections:

  • the navigation header - this includes the logo and the links to other pages.

  • the main body - this section houses the content for each page

  • the footer - contains general information about your website

Okay, now let's quickly build it out.
